ygData.subject: End is Near, Dawn of Time Edition...
ygData.msgSnippet: Diskus flew around in circles stupidly, Plintissa watching him. The 2 were not at the battle outside, as Diskus didn t know it was happening, and Plintissa

------=_NextPart_000_0246_01C0BBF0.55807140
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Diskus flew around in circles stupidly, Plintissa watching him. The 2 were =
not at the battle outside, as Diskus didn't know it was happening, and Plin=
tissa didn't care. Diskus pondered Plintissa, wondering what her problem wa=
s all of the time. Zeni listened to what was happening outside of the room =
Arrow locked him in, wondering if Arrow was okay.
-------------------------=
----------------------------------------------------------------
Pinsir sta=
nds by Scyther and watches to make sure no harm comes to him. It was his jo=
b, he thought,
------------------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------
Gotron falls asleep because he didn't know wh=
ere everyone went. A bit forgetful, he had forgotten where everyone went an=
d just stood there for days.
----------------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------------
Shokaract is still staring at t=
he Iron Fist. Something had made him mad, and he was in a bad mood.

Kracke=
n: Boss...we ever going to move?

Shokaract: You ask? Ha.

Grenade: Does th=
at mean no?

Shokaract: Deemos thinks he's got it all now. He makes up a fa=
ntasy in his little mind. He should follow the leader and let the blind lea=
d the blind.

Kracken: Huh?

Shokaract: Deemos is going to fall someday, or=
 leave us or something, and put me in complete control, after I don't even =
WANT CONTROL ANYMORE!!!

Krackne: You okay?

Shokaract: No, I'm NOT OKAY!

=
Kracken: ....

Shokaract: Deemos is no savior, he's just trying to benefit =
himself. He's wandering around. For someone who served as a true army hero,=
 he's sure lazing about. What shall he do next? Come bck and lay around aga=
in?

Beholder 2: Sure, we all are!

Shokaract: Not the point! He say's he's=
 the leader Omega, but he's nothing. He doesn't do anything for the good of=
 the team, and I can't take it anymore. I'm going away somewhere, whomever =
is coming shall do so. Or you could wait for Deemos and stay with him, your=
 choice.

The 5 Mob members follow Shokaract as he moves away.

Shokaract: =
To each his own, ancient as the cosmos, night falls, sun rises, day becomes=
 night, night becomes day, time flows unmercifully. Have mercy on us all wh=
en Omega screws up, Matrix, for we meant no harm other than what our team w=
anted. Forever more into the dark night.

The Mob watched Shokaract in puzz=
lement and followed...
----------------------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------
Divitri had been wnadering for weeks,=
 maybe a month, but it had been a long time ago that she originally set off=
 from the Maximal base. By some stroke of luck however, Divitri found Brigh=
tBlade. Dead and decaying, but it was her. Divitri could tlel, or was it Ga=
ngon could tell? Divitri cried and thought about how she could have died. W=
hat would life with her be like if they didn't split up? That was Gangon's =
mind thinking. Divitri stepped away from the deceased BrightBlade, and not =
thinking, pulled out her own blaster and shot herself through the head at l=
east 50 times, splattering her brains all over the woods. She thought about=
 her own life then, about how the experiment affected her and eventually le=
d to her death, and fell down and died next to BrightBlade, her memory chip=
 falling and rolling between BrightBlade and herself. Divitri's experiment =
led to her own undoing, and Gangon's life was revealed to be empty and obso=
lete without his BrightBlade, and couldn't go on. His ultimate end was not =
actually suicide, but had he known that his BrightBlade no longer lived, he=
 would have died by his own hands. Divitri never knew what she was getting =
into...... (Zardus, please add Divitri to the Matrix List)
----------------=
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
T=
hunderCracker for some reason had been frozen in place. He went wherever Vu=
lois was, though.
---------------------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------
Squawktalk stared blankly inside the Decep=
ticon base. (That's how you know when you got too many characters)
--------=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
------
